A paradox, in the praise of a dunce, to Smectymnuus by H. P. Peacham, Henry, 1576?-1643?
[2], 5 p.
Printed for Thomas Paybody ..., London : 1642.
A satire on episcopacy. Attributed to Henry Peacham. cf. NUC-pre 1956. Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
